## Description {#details}

This file contains the <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/webassembly">WebAssembly</a> implementation of <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetframelowering">TargetFrameLowering</a> class.

On <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/webassembly">WebAssembly</a>, there aren&#39;t a lot of things to do here. There are no callee-saved registers to save, and no spill slots.

The stack grows downward.

<SectionDefinition>

<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87"><Highlight kind="comment">/// We need a base pointer in the case of having items on the stack that</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"><Highlight kind="comment">/// require stricter alignment than the stack pointer itself.  Because we need</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><Highlight kind="comment">/// to shift the stack pointer by some unknown amount to force the alignment,</Highlight></CodeLine>
